info.title: SureXeroLite
info.description: Unlock the power of a versatile   connector designed for effortless setup and seamless integration into your   preferred business applications. With this connector, you can effortlessly   generate invoices, manage customers and products, and effortlessly access   invoice details, creating a smooth and efficient workflow.

get.description: Log in to your Xero account to get started
This action allows you to list the invoices from Xero that match the selected options

parameters.name: xero-tenant-id
parameters.description: Xero tenant id

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: Accept

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: Content-Type

parameters.name: where
parameters.description: Filter, for example Type=="ACCPAY" AND Status=="AUTHORISED"

parameters.name: Statuses
parameters.description: Filter on a comma separated list of statuses. for example- AUTHORISED, DRAFT

parameters.name: IDs
parameters.description: Filter on a comma separated list of IDs

parameters.name: InvoiceNumbers
parameters.description: Filter on a comma separated list of invoice number.

parameters.name: ContactIDs
parameters.description: Filter on a comma separated list of contact ids.

parameters.name: summaryOnly
parameters.description: Retrieve a smaller version of the response object.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Retrieving a collection of invoices using paging

TaxType.description: Used as an override if the default Tax Code for the selected AccountCode is not correct
TaxType.title: Tax Type

TaxAmount.description: The tax amount is auto calculated as a percentage of the line amount (see below) based on the tax rate.
TaxAmount.title: Tax Amount

LineAmount.description: The line amount reflects the discounted price if a DiscountRate has been used
LineAmount.title: Line Amount

AccountCode.description: Customer defined alpha numeric account code e.g 200 or SALES
AccountCode.title: Account Code

LineItemID.description: The Xero generated identifier for a LineItem
LineItemID.title: LineItem ID

Total.description: Total of Invoice tax inclusive (i.e. SubTotal + TotalTax)
Total.title: Total

CurrencyCode.description: The currency that invoice has been raised in
CurrencyCode.title: Currency Code

InvoiceID.description: Xero generated identifier for invoice (unique within organisations)
InvoiceID.title: Invoice ID

InvoiceNumber.description: Unique alpha numeric code identifying invoice
InvoiceNumber.title: Invoice Number

AmountDue.description: Amount remaining to be paid on invoice
AmountDue.title: Amount Due

AmountPaid.description: Sum of payments received for invoice
AmountPaid.title: Amount Paid

AmountCredited.description: Sum of all credit notes, over-payments and pre-payments applied to invoice
AmountCredited.title: Amount Credited

CurrencyRate.description: The currency rate for a multicurrency invoice
CurrencyRate.title: Currency Rate

FullyPaidOnDate.description: The date the invoice was fully paid
FullyPaidOnDate.title: Fully Paid On Date

BatchPaymentID.description: Present if the payment was created as part of a batch
BatchPaymentID.title: Batch Payment ID

PaymentID.description: Xero generated identifier for payment (unique within organisations)
PaymentID.title: Payment ID

Date.description: Date the payment is being made (YYYY-MM-DD) e.g. 2009-09-06
Date.title: Date

CurrencyRate.description: Exchange rate when payment is received
CurrencyRate.title: Currency Rate

post.description: This action allows you to add a new invoice in Xero

parameters.name: xero-tenant-id
parameters.description: Xero Tenant Id

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: Accept

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: Content-Type

Type.description: Invoice Type (ACCREC - a sales invoice  or customer invoice, ACCPAY-a bill or supplier invoice)
Type.title: Invoice Type

LineAmountTypes.description: Line amounts are exclusive of tax by default if you don't specify this element. (Exclusive, Inclusive, NoTax).
LineAmountTypes.title: Line Amount Types

InvoiceNumber.description: Unique alpha numeric code identifying invoice
InvoiceNumber.title: Invoice Number

AccountCode.description: Customer defined alpha numeric account code e.g 200 or SALES
AccountCode.title: Line Item Account Code

DiscountRate.description: Percentage discount or discount amount being applied to a line item.
DiscountRate.title: Discount Rate

CurrencyCode.description: The currency that invoice has been raised in
CurrencyCode.title: Currency Code

CurrencyRate.description: The currency rate for a multicurrency invoice
CurrencyRate.title: Currency Rate

ExpectedPaymentDate.description: Shown on sales invoices (Accounts Receivable) when this has been set
ExpectedPaymentDate.title: Expected Payment Date

TaxType.description: Used as an override if the default Tax Code for the selected AccountCode is not correct
TaxType.title: Tax Type

TaxAmount.description: The tax amount is auto calculated as a percentage of the line amount (see below) based on the tax rate.
TaxAmount.title: Tax Amount

LineAmount.description: The line amount reflects the discounted price if a DiscountRate has been used
LineAmount.title: Line Amount

AccountCode.description: Customer defined alpha numeric account code e.g 200 or SALES
AccountCode.title: Account Code

LineItemID.description: The Xero generated identifier for a LineItem
LineItemID.title: LineItem ID

Total.description: Total of Invoice tax inclusive (i.e. SubTotal + TotalTax)
Total.title: Total

CurrencyCode.description: The currency that invoice has been raised in
CurrencyCode.title: Currency Code

InvoiceID.description: Xero generated identifier for invoice (unique within organisations)
InvoiceID.title: Invoice ID

InvoiceNumber.description: Unique alpha numeric code identifying invoice
InvoiceNumber.title: Invoice Number

AmountDue.description: Amount remaining to be paid on invoice
AmountDue.title: Amount Due

AmountPaid.description: Sum of payments received for invoice
AmountPaid.title: Amount Paid

AmountCredited.description: Sum of all credit notes, over-payments and pre-payments applied to invoice
AmountCredited.title: Amount Credited

CurrencyRate.description: The currency rate for a multicurrency invoice
CurrencyRate.title: Currency Rate

get.description: This action allows you to list the contacts from Xero that match the selected options

parameters.name: where
parameters.description: Filter, for example Name="ABC limited"

parameters.name: IDs
parameters.description: Filter on a comma separated list of ContactIDs

parameters.name: summaryOnly
parameters.description: Retrieve a smaller version of the response object.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Retrieving a collection of invoices using paging

parameters.name: includeArchived
parameters.description: Contacts with a status of ARCHIVED will be included in the response

parameters.name: searchTerm
parameters.description: Search parameter that performs a case-insensitive text search across the field (Name, FirstName, LastName, ContactNumber, CompanyNumber, EmailAddress)

parameters.name: xero-tenant-id
parameters.description: Specify Xero tenant id

ContactNumber.description: This field is read only in the Xero UI, used to identify contacts in external systems. It is displayed as Contact Code in the Contacts UI in Xero.
ContactNumber.title: Contact Number

UpdatedDateUTC.description: UTC timestamp of last update to contact
UpdatedDateUTC.title: Updated Date UTC

post.description: This action allows you to add a new contact in Xero

parameters.name: xero-tenant-id
parameters.description: Xero Tenant ID

AccountsReceivableTaxType.description: Default tax type used for contact on AR invoices
AccountsReceivableTaxType.title: Accounts Receivable Tax Type

ContactNumber.description: Number to identify contacts in external systems
ContactNumber.title: Contact Number

scopes.offline_access accounting.transactions o: offline_access accounting.transactions openid profile email accounting.contacts accounting.settings

oauth2-auth: offline_access accounting.transactions openid profile email accounting.contacts accounting.settings
